title: Dazzling Diamond Dangles - A Modern Twist on Traditional Earrings
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut CZ (Cubic Zirconia) stones with excellent clarity. The gold has a rich
warm luster enhanced by our signature Hyderabadi polish.
features: These earrings feature a unique open 'infinity' design in gold, creating a graceful, elongated dangle. Each earring is adorned with a linear arrangement of sparkling CZ stones, set in a secure prong setting. The open design promotes light reflection, maximizing the brilliance of the stones. The earring hooks are designed for comfort and secure wear.
colors: shimmering white CZ stones. The contrast between the warm gold and the bright white stones creates a classic and elegant appeal.
occasions: or as a subtle yet sophisticated addition to your bridal trousseau. These earrings can be paired with both traditional South Indian outfits and modern attire
description: These contemporary dangle earrings beautifully blend modern aesthetics with the timeless appeal of gold jewelry. The CZ stones offer exceptional sparkle at an accessible price point. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability. Lightweight and comfortable, these earrings are perfect for extended wear. This is an excellent choice for someone seeking modern design in traditional gold.
